snippet.title: MetroRunner : Step into the Metro - Official Gameplay Trailer (2025)
snippet.description:
Step into the dystopian post-post-apocalyptic world of MetroRunner. Explore, Fight, Scavenge and Craft new weapons as you navigate an underground society holding itself captive. Face powerful foes, uncover hidden secrets in this unique indie game experience.

Wishlist Metrorunner on steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3182350/MetroRunner/

Free demo available now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3200760/MetroRunner_Demo/
